Articles.Content:
I wanna put some node parameters in my part config


MODULE
{
 name = MyPart
 nodeA = nodeNameA
 nodeB = theOtherNode
}

I need some examples on how to read them correctly, please.

Edited April 30, 2015 by Xyphos

Look at the [KSPField] use, that is the command you are looking for.

Note that you can't add new values to the PART, you can only add values to a PARTMODULE.

Most mods will have examples of KSPFields use, that should get you started.

D.
